ygData.subject: RE: Re: Crafted Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: I went there this weekend with me (Level 30 Ranger), Level 30 Paladin, Level 33 warrior and a Level 20 Paladin. We were overkill for everything, even the king
ygData.messageBody:
I went there this weekend with me (Level 30 Ranger),
Level 30 Paladin, Level 33 warrior and a Level 20
Paladin. We were overkill for everything, even the
king is blue to me. The only problem was the Level 20
Paladin was causing trains due to his low level.

If you are a 32 shaman (not sure if you mean you, and
a 32 Shaman) I would bring a Ranger/Paladin/Warrior/SK
to do the main tanking. You will more than likely get
jumped by a few elite goblin guards which could get
rough. Especially if you get Borxx, you want to
interrupt his casting, which a ranger or warrior can
do well with dual wield/double attack and decent
weapons.

Good luck,

Belgarth

--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Well, I heard he (Borxx) spawns in the King's Room.
> I'll be going with
> (atleast) myself (32 Shaman) plus a druid friend (29
> Druid), and will nuke
> his ass off when he spawns if possible. That's
> assuming someone is camping
> the kings room.... If not, well...I'll have to bring
> some friends. Might
> have to pull a higher level friend or two....hrm....
> Camping the King's room
> could be fun though for a higher level group.
>
> Anyone camped this room before? Know what kind of
> group it would take to
> camp sucessfully and control it? right now, my group
> has been camping the
> King's room in Perma and controling it well ('cept
> when the pull goes bad
> for the higher levelers and 3-5 Ice Giants come
> charging into the
> room.....ouch....*chuckle*).
>
